DefaultEvent.Description: A few day's work, more sherry, and the adjustments are complete. Your vessel's new pipework gleams. Beneath the water, you can just make out the graceful curve of her retracted shell-hull.

ChildBranches.Name: Have your ship converted for zubmarine travel
ChildBranches.Description: The Philanthropist greets you warmly, with sherry. "Your money's no good here! I owe your predecessor a great debt."

Description: $Aft -> 後部$It sits on an inlet at the port's edge. Here, the Fierce Philanthropist runs an illicit but profitable business converting ships into zubmarines. After all, philanthropy doesn't come cheap.
Name: The Old Sapphire Processing Plant
